channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Out of This World
channel.desc: In this episode, Dr Maggie takes us into space to study Earth and see how it has helped us to understand climate change. Dr Maggie?s star guest is Susanne Mecklenburg, who is in charge of analysing Earth?s climate at the European Space Agency. All your space questions are answered in Ask Maggie, and she counts down the top five surprising space facts.
